availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Eliza Jane Coblin. Father of Susan Coblin, Mary Coblin, Abraham Coblin, John R. Coblin, James H.P. Coblin, Joseph P. Coblin, Thomas L. Coblin, Oretta Coblin, and Ann Eliza Coblin. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owner of two enslaved people in 1850. Owned James [Unknown] in Henry County in 1857. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owner of one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Henry County Deaths.
